queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

SELECT distinct -- concat('MRN_SPE05#LI',qry_sscc.SSCC,'#',qry_sscc.SSCC) DD mr.reqno as 'ReqNo' , concat('MRN_SPE01#SREQ&arg1=',mr.reqno) ILIAS , concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',mr.store,'#0#',mr.store) as 'Store' , mr.req_authority 'BurAnal' , mo.parent as 'Parent' , concat('MRN_SPE09#03#RS#',mr.status,'#1#',mr.status) as 'Status' , mr.type as 'Type' , mr.code as 'Code' , concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',mr.stfrom,'#0#',mr.stfrom) as 'StFrom' , date(mr.reqdate) as '_ReqDate_' , datediff(now(),mr.reqdate) as 'Age' , mr.wo as 'WO' , mr.pur_org as 'PurOrg' , mr.remark as 'Comments' , concat('MRN_SPE09#05##',mr_nsn.nsn,'#1#',mr_nsn.nsn) '______NSN______' , mn.hazard as 'Hazard' , mn.un_code as 'UN-Code' , round(mr_nsn.qty,0) as 'Req_Qty' , round(mr_nsn.issqty,0) as 'Iss_Qty' , round(mr_nsn.recqty,0) as 'Rec_Qty' , concat('MRN_SPE02#10010&p|TRANSFER=',qry_sscc.transfer,'#',qry_sscc.transfer) Transfer , concat('MRN_SPE20#http://mrnode.mil.intra/LRF/XMLWeb/ProcessDescriptor/descriptor/LRF/IL_MR_SSCC/IL_MR_SSCC_DETAIL.xml?p|RID=15&p|SSCC=',qry_sscc.SSCC,'#_blank#8#',qry_sscc.SSCC) as 'SSCC' , mr_nsn.unit_price , mn.macode , mn.reap_type
, mrqr_requisitions_actions.text Actions
FROM mrqr_requisitions mr inner join mrqr_organisms mo on mo.organism=left(mr.store,2)
inner join mrqr_mission_codes mmc on mr.mission_code_id=mmc.mission_code_id
left join mrqr_requisitions_nsn mr_nsn on mr.reqno=mr_nsn.reqno left join mrqr_nsn mn on mr_nsn.nsn=mn.nsn
left join mrqr_requisitions_actions on mrqr_requisitions_actions.reqno=mr.reqno
left join (select distinct mto.reqno , mto.nsn ,mto.transfer , mto.SSCC , mcms.priority from mrqr_transactions_open mto left join mrqr_cargo_manifests_sscc mcms on mto.sscc=mcms.sscc where (length(replace(replace('pNSN','%',''),'_',''))>=3 OR length(replace(replace('pSTORE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pSTFROM','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pREQNO','%',''),'_',''))>=2
OR length(replace(replace('pMACODE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pMISSIONCODE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 )
and if ('pREQNO'='',true,mto.reqno like 'pREQNO') and if ('pSTORE'='',true,mto.destination like 'pSTORE') and if ('pSTFROM'='',true,mto.store like 'pSTFROM') )qry_sscc on mr.reqno=qry_sscc.reqno and mr_nsn.nsn=qry_sscc.nsn where (length(replace(replace('pNSN','%',''),'_',''))>=3 OR length(replace(replace('pSTORE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pSTFROM','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pREQNO','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pMACODE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pMISSIONCODE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 ) and IF('pREQNO'='',true, mr.reqno like 'pREQNO') and if ('pTYPE'='',true, mr.type like 'pTYPE') and if ('pSTORE'='',true, mr.store like 'pSTORE') and if ('pSTFROM'='',true, mr.stfrom like 'pSTFROM')
and
mr.status like 'pSTATUS'
and if ('pNSN'='',true, mr_nsn.nsn ='pNSN') and if ('pMACODE'='',true, mr.macode ='pMACODE') and if ('pPRIO'='',true, mr.code ='pPRIO') and if ('pWO'='',true, mr.wo ='pWO') and if ('pDATESTART'='',true,date(mr.reqdate)>='pDATESTART') and if ('pDATEEND'='',true,date(mr.reqdate)<='pDATEEND')
and if ('pMISSIONCODE'='',true, mmc.mission_code like 'pMISSIONCODE')
and IF('pHIDE_RECEIVED'='on',mr_nsn.qty>mr_nsn.recqty,true) and IF('pHIDE_ISSUED'='on',mr_nsn.qty>mr_nsn.issqty,true)
order by mr.reqno
